metadata.title: CVE-2024-50069 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:pinctrl: apple: check devm_kasprintf() returned valuedevm_kasprintf() can return a NULL pointer on failure but this returnedvalue is not checked. Fix this lack and check the returned value.Found by code review.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.11.0-17.17').
linux-aws package in oracular is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.11.0-1009.10').
